Text:
english subtitles for this?

thx for the upload. Tropa De Elite 1 was good.
I cannot download torrent file, always got message: "No input file specified. " Why?
Just use Magnet Link to download the torrent and it will work...
Beware! The English subtitles are breaking bad - probably machine translated from the Portugese ones :( Still one can understand something, but it is pretty nonsense almost all the time.
Warning: Machine translated Portugese - English subtitles :(

"Warning: Machine translated Portugese"??? This is a brazilian movie... of course it is portuguese... and WTF did you mean by "machine translated"? For those who get error downloading torrent file, use magnet link.
